title Gridblocked
author Tom Hermans [@Auroriax]
homepage auroriax.com
background_color #222222

(VERSION HISTORY:
v4 - Fixes issue that multiple cursors could appear. Re-exported using engine version 1706
v3 - Re-exported using engine version ~1694
v2 - Fixes some minor graphical issues.
v1 - Initial release
)

(If you want to work on the game or add more puzzles or something, note the following limitations:

- Cars cannot start through portals. This can probably be implemented, but it requires a lot of lines of code, so I worked around it for the base game.
- Blocks can only be stretched in one direction (you can have 2x1 or even 5x1 blocks, but NOT 2x2 blocks or other shapes like tetrominos).
- Warps that transport blocks horizontally, can ONLY be placed on vertically moving blocks (not on horizontal blocks), and vice verca.

Hope this helps!
)

sprite_size 32

continue_is_level_select

mouse_left Click
mouse_drag Drag

=======
LEGEND
=======

CantLeaveLevel = 1 or 2 or 3 or 4 or 5 or 6 or 7
HorCrate = 0 or CantLeaveLevel
VerCrate = a or b or c or d or e or f or g or h

Crate = HorCrate or VerCrate

HorEdge = LeftEdge or RightEdge
Indent = LeftEdgeIndent or RightEdgeIndent
VerEdge = TopEdge or BottomEdge
Edge = HorEdge or VerEdge

VerBlock = HorCrate or Wall
HorBlock = VerCrate or Wall

Solid = Wall or Crate

LeftWarp = Warp2 or Warp4
RightWarp = Warp1 or Warp3
UpWarp = WarpA or WarpC
DownWarp = WarpB or WarpD

HorWarp = LeftWarp or RightWarp
VerWarp = DownWarp or UpWarp

WarpIn = Warp1 or Warp3 or WarpA or WarpC 
WarpOut = Warp2 or Warp4 or WarpB or WarpD 

Warp = WarpIn or WarpOut

HorWarpable = VerWarp or HorEdge
VerWarpable = HorWarp or VerEdge
Warpable = Warp or Edge

~ = a and Warp1
` = a and Warp2
% = a and Warp3
+ = a and Warp4
' = 1 and WarpA
" = 1 and WarpB
@ = b and Warp1
x = 2 and WarpA

{ = Warp1 and Wall
} = Warp2 and Wall
/ = Warp3 and Wall
\ = Warp4 and Wall
! = WarpA and Wall
? = WarpB and Wall
: = WarpC and Wall
; = WarpD and Wall

u = UndoButton and Wall
i = UndoText and Wall

r = RetryButton and Wall
j = RetryText and Wall

q = QuitButton and Wall
n = QuitText and Wall

 = Sign and SignOne and Wall

SignA, SignB, SignC, SignD, SignE

Cursor
Click, Drag
Trail
PrevDrag

Cross

======
RULES
======

(Cleanup visuals from last round, if any)
[Cross] -> []
[WarpEffect] -> []
[Indent] -> []

(Attempt to check if this is the first turn)
random [Background] -> [Background Init]
[Init] [Cursor] -> [] [Cursor]

(Initialization: generate block edges)
left [Init] [0 | no 0] -> [Init] [0 LeftEdge | ]
right [Init] [0 | no 0] -> [Init] [0 RightEdge | ]
left [Init] [1 | no 1] -> [Init] [1 LeftEdge | ]
right [Init] [1 | no 1] -> [Init] [1 RightEdge | ]
left [Init] [2 | no 2] -> [Init] [2 LeftEdge | ]
right [Init] [2 | no 2] -> [Init] [2 RightEdge | ]
left [Init] [3 | no 3] -> [Init] [3 LeftEdge | ]
right [Init] [3 | no 3] -> [Init] [3 RightEdge | ]
left [Init] [4 | no 4] -> [Init] [4 LeftEdge | ]
right [Init] [4 | no 4] -> [Init] [4 RightEdge | ]
left [Init] [5 | no 5] -> [Init] [5 LeftEdge | ]
right [Init] [5 | no 5] -> [Init] [5 RightEdge | ]
left [Init] [6 | no 6] -> [Init] [6 LeftEdge | ]
right [Init] [6 | no 6] -> [Init] [6 RightEdge | ]
left [Init] [7 | no 7] -> [Init] [7 LeftEdge | ]
right [Init] [7 | no 7] -> [Init] [7 RightEdge | ]

up [Init] [a | no a] -> [Init] [a TopEdge | ]
down [Init] [a | no a] -> [Init] [a BottomEdge | ]
up [Init] [b | no b] -> [Init] [b TopEdge | ]
down [Init] [b | no b] -> [Init] [b BottomEdge | ]
up [Init] [c | no c] -> [Init] [c TopEdge | ]
down [Init] [c | no c] -> [Init] [c BottomEdge | ]
up [Init] [d | no d] -> [Init] [d TopEdge | ]
down [Init] [d | no d] -> [Init] [d BottomEdge | ]
up [Init] [e | no e] -> [Init] [e TopEdge | ]
down [Init] [e | no e] -> [Init] [e BottomEdge | ]
up [Init] [f | no f] -> [Init] [f TopEdge | ]
down [Init] [f | no f] -> [Init] [f BottomEdge | ]
up [Init] [g | no g] -> [Init] [g TopEdge | ]
down [Init] [g | no g] -> [Init] [g BottomEdge | ]
up [Init] [h | no h] -> [Init] [h TopEdge | ]
down [Init] [h | no h] -> [Init] [h BottomEdge | ]

(Generate wall edges)
down [Init] [Wall no VerWarp | no Wall] -> [Init] [Wall | WallTopLeft WallTopRight]
up [Init] [Wall no VerWarp | no Wall] -> [Init] [Wall | WallBottomLeft WallBottomRight]

left [Init] [no Wall | WallTopRight] -> [Init] [ | ]
left [Init] [HorWarp | WallTopRight] -> [Init] [HorWarp | ]
right [Init] [no Wall | WallTopLeft] -> [Init] [ | ]
right [Init] [HorWarp | WallTopLeft] -> [Init] [HorWarp | ]

left [Init] [no Wall | WallBottomRight] -> [Init] [ | ]
left [Init] [HorWarp | WallBottomRight] -> [Init] [HorWarp | ]
right [Init] [no Wall | WallBottomLeft] -> [Init] [ | ]
right [Init] [HorWarp | WallBottomLeft] -> [Init] [HorWarp | ]

[Init] -> []

(Cleaning & Input handling)
[Trail] -> []

[Click UndoButton] -> undo
[Click RetryButton] -> restart
[Click QuitButton] -> quit

[Click] [Cursor] -> [Click] []
[Click] [PrevDrag] -> [Click] []
[Click] -> [Cursor PrevDrag] sfx0 nosave

[Cursor] [PrevDrag | Drag] -> [> Cursor ] [ | PrevDrag]
[horizontal Cursor verCrate] -> [Cursor verCrate]
[vertical Cursor horCrate] -> [Cursor horCrate]

[horizontal Cursor horCrate] -> [horizontal Cursor horizontal horCrate] sfx1
[vertical Cursor verCrate] -> [vertical Cursor vertical verCrate] sfx1

[Click] -> []
[Drag] -> []

(Pass movement to all crates of the same type)
(Horizontal)
startloop


  [> 0] [stationary 0] -> [> 0] [> 0]
  +[> 1] [stationary 1] -> [> 1] [> 1]
  +[> 2] [stationary 2] -> [> 2] [> 2]
  +[> 3] [stationary 3] -> [> 3] [> 3]
  +[> 4] [stationary 4] -> [> 4] [> 4]
  +[> 5] [stationary 5] -> [> 5] [> 5]
  +[> 6] [stationary 6] -> [> 6] [> 6]
  +[> 7] [stationary 7] -> [> 7] [> 7]
  
  (If moving a car would push another one, attempt to push that one too)
  +horizontal [> horCrate | stationary horCrate] -> [> horCrate | > horCrate]
  
  (If being pushed into a portal, attempt to push any block on the other side)
  +horizontal [> HorCrate | Warp1] [Warp2 | stationary HorCrate] -> [> HorCrate | Warp1] [Warp2 | > HorCrate]
  +horizontal [> HorCrate | Warp2] [Warp1 | stationary HorCrate] -> [> HorCrate | Warp2] [Warp1 | > HorCrate]
  +horizontal [> HorCrate | Warp3] [Warp4 | stationary HorCrate] -> [> HorCrate | Warp3] [Warp4 | > HorCrate]
  +horizontal [> HorCrate | Warp4] [Warp3 | stationary HorCrate] -> [> HorCrate | Warp4] [Warp3 | > HorCrate]
  
endloop

(Vertical)
startloop
  +[> a] [stationary a] -> [> a] [> a]
  +[> b] [stationary b] -> [> b] [> b]
  +[> c] [stationary c] -> [> c] [> c]
  +[> d] [stationary d] -> [> d] [> d]
  +[> e] [stationary e] -> [> e] [> e]
  +[> f] [stationary f] -> [> f] [> f]
  +[> g] [stationary g] -> [> g] [> g]
  +[> h] [stationary h] -> [> h] [> h]

  (If moving a car would push another one, attempt to push that one too)
  +vertical [> verCrate | stationary verCrate] -> [> verCrate | > verCrate]
  
  (If being pushed into a portal, attempt to push any block on the other side)
  +vertical [> VerCrate | WarpA] [WarpB | stationary VerCrate] -> [> VerCrate | WarpA] [WarpB | > VerCrate]
  +vertical [> VerCrate | WarpB] [WarpA | stationary VerCrate] -> [> VerCrate | WarpB] [WarpA | > VerCrate]
  +vertical [> VerCrate | WarpC] [WarpD | stationary VerCrate] -> [> VerCrate | WarpC] [WarpD | > VerCrate]
  +vertical [> VerCrate | WarpD] [WarpC | stationary VerCrate] -> [> VerCrate | WarpD] [WarpC | > VerCrate]

endloop

(Prevent moving cars with teleporters on them if there's currently a car partially sticking out of that portal)
right [LeftWarp vertical VerCrate | HorCrate no LeftEdge] -> [LeftWarp VerCrate | HorCrate Cross]
left [RightWarp vertical VerCrate | HorCrate no RightEdge] -> [RightWarp VerCrate | HorCrate Cross]

down [UpWarp horizontal HorCrate | VerCrate no TopEdge] -> [UpWarp HorCrate | VerCrate Cross]
up [DownWarp horizontal HorCrate | verCrate no BottomEdge] -> [DownWarp HorCrate | verCrate Cross]

(Any crosses? Then the turn is invalid, stop all movement)
[Cross] [> Crate] -> [Cross] [Crate]
[Cross] [> Cursor] -> [Cross] [Cursor] sfx2

(Move teleporters & edges that are attached to blocks)
[> HorCrate VerWarp] -> [> HorCrate > VerWarp]
[> VerCrate HorWarp] -> [> VerCrate > HorWarp]

[> HorCrate HorEdge] -> [> HorCrate > HorEdge]
[> VerCrate VerEdge] -> [> VerCrate > VerEdge]

(Resolve movement for all non-teleporting crates that can move)
[> HorCrate | No HorWarp No Crate] -> [ | HorCrate]
[> VerCrate | No VerWarp No Crate] -> [ | VerCrate]

(Push crates through teleporters, attempt to move cursor first)
right [> horCrate > Cursor | Warp1] [Warp2 no horCrate] -> [ | Warp1] [Warp2 > horCrate > Cursor]
left [> horCrate > Cursor | Warp2] [Warp1 no horCrate] -> [ | Warp2] [Warp1 > horCrate > Cursor]
right [> horCrate > Cursor | Warp3] [Warp4 no horCrate] -> [ | Warp3] [Warp4 > horCrate > Cursor]
left [> horCrate > Cursor | Warp4] [Warp3 no horCrate] -> [ | Warp4] [Warp3 > horCrate > Cursor]

up [> verCrate > Cursor | WarpA] [WarpB no verCrate] -> [ | WarpA] [WarpB > verCrate > Cursor]
down [> verCrate > Cursor| WarpB] [WarpA no verCrate] -> [ | WarpB] [WarpA > verCrate > Cursor]
up [> verCrate > Cursor| WarpC] [WarpD no verCrate] -> [ | WarpC] [WarpD > verCrate > Cursor]
down [> verCrate > Cursor| WarpD] [WarpC no verCrate] -> [ | WarpD] [WarpC > verCrate > Cursor]

(Then attempt to push through teleporters normally)
right [> horCrate | Warp1] [Warp2 no horCrate] -> [ | Warp1] [Warp2 > horCrate]
left [> horCrate | Warp2] [Warp1 no horCrate] -> [ | Warp2] [Warp1 > horCrate]
right [> horCrate | Warp3] [Warp4 no horCrate] -> [ | Warp3] [Warp4 > horCrate]
left [> horCrate | Warp4] [Warp3 no horCrate] -> [ | Warp4] [Warp3 > horCrate]

up [> verCrate | WarpA] [WarpB no verCrate] -> [ | WarpA] [WarpB > verCrate]
down [> verCrate | WarpB] [WarpA no verCrate] -> [ | WarpB] [WarpA > verCrate]
up [> verCrate | WarpC] [WarpD no verCrate] -> [ | WarpC] [WarpD > verCrate]
down [> verCrate | WarpD] [WarpC no verCrate] -> [ | WarpD] [WarpC > verCrate]

(Push warpable objects through teleporters)
horizontal [> HorWarpable | Warp1] [Warp2 | ] -> [ | Warp1] [Warp2 | HorWarpable]
horizontal [> HorWarpable | Warp2] [Warp1 | ] -> [ | Warp2] [Warp1 | HorWarpable]
horizontal [> HorWarpable | Warp3] [Warp4 | ] -> [ | Warp3] [Warp4 | HorWarpable]
horizontal [> HorWarpable | Warp4] [Warp3 | ] -> [ | Warp4] [Warp3 | HorWarpable]

vertical [> VerWarpable | WarpA] [WarpB | ] -> [ | WarpA] [WarpB | VerWarpable]
vertical [> VerWarpable | WarpB] [WarpA | ] -> [ | WarpB] [WarpA | VerWarpable]
vertical [> VerWarpable | WarpC] [WarpD | ] -> [ | WarpC] [WarpD | VerWarpable]
vertical [> VerWarpable | WarpD] [WarpC | ] -> [ | WarpD] [WarpC | VerWarpable]

(MOVEMENT HAPPENS HERE)

(Move validation)
late [Cursor no Crate] -> nosave

late [verCrate VerBlock] -> cancel
late [horCrate HorBlock] -> cancel
late [verCrate horCrate] -> cancel
late [CantLeaveLevel Target] -> cancel

(For warped crates, create a nice effect)
late left [RightWarp | HorCrate no RightEdge] -> [RightWarp | HorCrate WarpEffectR]
late right [LeftWarp | HorCrate no LeftEdge] -> [LeftWarp | HorCrate WarpEffectL]
late up [DownWarp | VerCrate no BottomEdge] -> [DownWarp | VerCrate WarpEffectD]
late down [UpWarp | VerCrate no TopEdge] -> [UpWarp | VerCrate WarpEffectU]

late [LeftEdge no LeftEdgeIndent] -> [LeftEdge LeftEdgeIndent]
late [RightEdge no RightEdgeIndent] -> [RightEdge RightEdgeIndent]

==============
WINCONDITIONS
==============

Any Target
All Target on LeftEdge
